attributes.action: ensure our MPs MEPs & Council Officials apply for funds in the event of natural disasters.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This fund was set up in 2002 by the European Commission, to restore vital infrastructure after natural disasters.
Germany, Austria,Czech Rep. and France have had millions of euros in aid. We don't appear to have had one euro in England. Because no-one applied.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
